extendedInfo.description: U.S. 270 is an electoral map viewer and editor. You can use it to explore possible election outcomes for the 2012 presidential race (It takes 270 votes to win) or even create your own electoral map with different candidates.  You can also easily e-mail pictures of your maps. Future updates will add historical data and a full featured map editor.

reviews.title: Great!!!!!!!
reviews.comment: Will allow me to track the electoral college and see what states are won by Obama and Romney. I was doing this on paper but not now.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Cool fun app
reviews.comment: Cool app to keep track of EC. Only thing I would say is missing would be a totally blank map and can\'t wait for the historical data. Those two things would add a 5th star to my rating.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Features pictured don\'t exist
reviews.comment: The photos show a breakdown of the totals in the bottom center of the screen and show a zoom capability.  Neither exist in the free or paid version.  I would like a refund or to be shown what I am doing wrong.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: This needs to be a lwp!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Works just fine
reviews.comment: Simple, intuitive.  Exactly what I was looking for....thanks dev!
reviews.author: A Google User
